page.title: 13 Yardley Utd. Football Club
page.content: During the season, men from the village play football at the "Greenyard" which is the local football pitch. The club was first formed in 1963 and plays in the Premier League, having reached the finals of the Sunday League Cup.The club runs 3 seperate teams,a Saturday 1st.team, Saturday Reserve team, and a Sunday team Within the past 20 years many trophies have been won including 1)The N.F.A. area cup,2)10,League and cup wins, 3) various five a side cups, including the "Lings- Forum Easter Tournament". Soon the club will be forming a new under eleven's team,and they hope yo play in the local Youth League starting in 1983. There is a Club House with changing room but the facilities need to be much improved.
